attributes.action: Improve the existing street lighting and introduce new street lights to Addington Grove, SE26 4JX
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, those who commit criminal activities or are involved in anti-social behaviour use Addington Grove as a place to commit crime, or as an escape route. This is due to the fact that most of the street is in darkness as a result of poor street lighting. We believe that with better street lighting we will feel safer on our own road as it will be a less desirable place for perpetrators of crime, and a more desirable place for residents.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
